page.title: Window
page.introduction: The Window menu bar option allows the user to arrange the open windows in the current VCell document.

operations.para: Clicking the Window menu displays the available options to arrange the open windows in the current VCell document.

list.item: Tile Horizontally - arranges the windows horizontally.
Tile Vertically - arranges the windows vertically.
Minimize All - minimizes all the open windows.
